page.title: 06GAMES AND HOBBIES
page.content: The main games played by boys in school are football in the Winter and Spring and cricket in the Summer.The chief game for girls is rounders although netball is sometimes played.We have matches against other schools and sometimes inter-school tournaments for all the town's schools.Popular out of school are fishing, tennis, roller-skating and riding of BMX bicycles, tough machines used for stunt riding, jumping ramps etc. Safety helmets and pads are worn. Indoor pastimes included lego, battery electronic games,T.V. games,cardgames, cooking,reading,and much watching of TV and video films.Popular with Adults are gardening,house and car repairs. Jogging is widerpread.The Leisure Centre is well used by adults and children,the main activities are swimming,badminton,squash,and weights.
